template.name: Template F5 Big-IP SNMP
template.description:
MIBs used: RFC1213-MIB F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB
Template tooling version used: 0.38

item.name: F5 BIG-IP: Contact
item.description: MIB: RFC1213-MIB The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person.

item.name: F5 BIG-IP: Failover status

trigger.name: F5 BIG-IP: Cluster not in sync: {ITEM.VALUE}

item.name: F5 BIG-IP: Location
item.description: MIB: RFC1213-MIB The physical location of this node (e.g., `telephone closet, 3rd floor').

item.name: F5 BIG-IP: Hardware model name
item.description: MIB: RFC1213-MIB A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software. It is mandatory that this only contain printable ASCII characters.

item.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host name
item.description: MIB: RFC1213-MIB An administratively-assigned name for this managed node. By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name.

item.name: F5 BIG-IP: Product build
item.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The product build number.

item.name: F5 BIG-IP: Product build date
item.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The product build date.

trigger.name: F5 BIG-IP: Chassis has been replaced (new serial number received)
trigger.description: Chassis serial number has changed. Ack to close

item.name: F5 BIG-IP: Sync Status

trigger.name: F5 BIG-IP: Changes have been made on the device not sync to the device group: {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger.description: Changes have been made on the device not sync to the device group, requires user intervention

trigger.name: F5 BIG-IP: The device is inconsistent with the device group: {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger.description: The device is inconsistent with the device group, requires user intervention

item.name: F5 BIG-IP: TCP connections, CLOSE-WAIT/LAST-ACK
item.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The number of current TCP connections in CLOSE-WAIT/LAST-ACK.

item.name: F5 BIG-IP: TCP connections, FIN-WAIT-1/CLOSING
item.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The number of current TCP connections in FIN-WAIT-1/CLOSING.

item.name: F5 BIG-IP: TCP connections, FIN-WAIT-2
item.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The number of current TCP connections in FIN-WAIT-2.

item.name: F5 BIG-IP: Open TCP connections
item.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The number of current open TCP connections.

item.name: F5 BIG-IP: TCP connections, TIME-WAIT
item.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The number of current TCP connections in TIME-WAIT.

item.name: F5 BIG-IP: Open UDP connections
item.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The number of current open UDP connections.

item.name: F5 BIG-IP: Uptime
item.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The system up time in 1/100 seconds since boot.

trigger.name: F5 BIG-IP: No SNMP data collection
trigger.description: SNMP is not available for polling. Please check device connectivity and SNMP settings.

discovery_rule.name: Blade temperature discovery
discovery_rule.description: Containing information of blade temperature of the system

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Sensor [{#SLOT.INDEX}:{#TEMP.INDEX}]: Temperature
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB Location: {#TEMP.LOCATION} The blade temperature (in Celsius) of the indexed sensor on the system., This is only supported for the platform where the sensor data is available.

discovery_rule.name: Blade voltage discovery
discovery_rule.description: A table containing information of blade voltage of the system.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Voltage [{#VOLT.INDEX}]: Slot
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The chassis slot number, if applicable.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Voltage [{#VOLT.INDEX}]: Value
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The blade voltage (in V) of the indexed sensor on the system., This is only supported for the platform where the sensor data is available.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Certificate [{#CERT.NAME}]: Expiration date
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The expiration date of the certificate in unix time.

trigger_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Less than {$BIGIP.CERT.MIN} days left until the certificate expires ({#CERT.NAME})

discovery_rule.name: Chassis fan discovery
discovery_rule.description: A table containing information of chassis fan status of the system

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: FAN [{#FAN.INDEX}]: Speed
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The actual speed of the indexed chassis fan on the system. This is only supported for the platform where the actual fan speed data is available. '0' means fan speed is unavailable while the associated chassis status is good.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: FAN [{#FAN.INDEX}]: Status
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The status of the indexed chassis fan on the system., This is only supported for the platform where the sensor data is available. Possible values: 0 - bad, 1 - good, 2 - notpresent.

trigger_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Fan[{#FAN.INDEX}] is in critical state
F5 BIG-IP: Fan[{#FAN.INDEX}] is not present

discovery_rule.name: Chassis power supply discovery
discovery_rule.description: A table containing information of chassis power supply status of the system.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Power supply [{#POWER.INDEX}]: Status
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The status of the indexed power supply on the system., This is only supported for the platform where the sensor data is available. Possible values: 0 - bad, 1 - good, 2 - notpresent.

trigger_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Power supply [{#POWER.INDEX}] is in critical state
trigger_prototype.description: Please check the power supply unit

trigger_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Power supply [{#POWER.INDEX}] is not present
trigger_prototype.description: Please check the power supply unit

discovery_rule.name: Chassis temperature discovery
discovery_rule.description: A table containing information of chassis temperature of the system

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Sensor [{#TEMP.INDEX}]: Temperature
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The chassis temperature (in Celsius) of the indexed sensor on the system., This is only supported for the platform where the sensor data is available.

trigger_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Chassis temperature ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}) of sensor {#TEMP.INDEX} exceeds threshold of {$BIGIP.TEMP.HIGH} °C
F5 BIG-IP: Chassis temperature ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}) of sensor {#TEMP.INDEX} exceeds threshold of {$BIGIP.TEMP.WARN} °C

dependency.name: F5 BIG-IP: Chassis temperature ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}) of sensor {#TEMP.INDEX} exceeds threshold of {$BIGIP.TEMP.HIGH} °C

discovery_rule.name: CPU discovery
discovery_rule.description: A table containing entries of system CPU usage information for a system.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: Idle, avg 1m
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor doing nothing for the associated host in the last one minute.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: Idle, avg 5m
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor doing nothing for the associated host in the last five minutes.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: Idle, avg 5s
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor doing nothing for the associated host in the last five seconds.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: IO wait, avg 1m
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor waiting for external I/O to complete for the associated host in the last one minute.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: IO wait, avg 5m
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor waiting for external I/O to complete for the associated host in the last five minutes.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: IO wait, avg 5s
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor waiting for external I/O to complete for the associated host in the last five seconds.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: IRQ, avg 1m
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor servicing hardware interrupts for the associated host in the last one minute.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: IRQ, avg 5m
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor servicing hardware interrupts for the associated host in the last five minutes.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: IRQ, avg 5s
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor servicing hardware interrupts for the associated host in the last five seconds.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: Nice, avg 1m
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor running niced processes for the associated host in the last one minute.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: Nice, avg 5m
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor running niced processes for the associated host in the last five minutes.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: Nice, avg 5s
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor running niced processes for the associated host in the last five seconds.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: Soft IRQ, avg 1m
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor servicing soft interrupts for the associated host in the last one minute.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: Soft IRQ, avg 5m
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor servicing soft interrupts for the associated host in the last five minutes.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: Soft IRQ, avg 5s
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor servicing soft interrupts for the associated host in the last five seconds.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: Stolen, avg 1m
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time 'stolen' from the specified processor for the associated host in the last one minute.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: Stolen, avg 1s)
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time 'stolen' from the specified processor for the associated host in the last five seconds.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: Stolen, avg 5m
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time 'stolen' from the specified processor for the associated host in the last five minutes.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: System, avg 1m
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor servicing system calls for the associated host in the last one minute.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: System, avg 5m
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor servicing system calls for the associated host in the last five minutes.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: System, avg 5s
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor servicing system calls for the associated host in the last five seconds.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: Usage ratio, avg 1m
F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: Usage ratio, avg 5m

trigger_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: High CPU utilization (over {$BIGIP.CPU.UTIL.WARN.MAX}% for 5m)
trigger_prototype.description: CPU utilization is too high. The system might be slow to respond.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: Usage ratio, avg 5s
F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: User, avg 1m
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor in user context for the associated host in the last one minute.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: User, avg 5m
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor in user context for the associated host in the last five minutes.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: User, avg 5s
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The average time spent by the specified processor in user context for the associated host in the last five seconds.

graph_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: Usage ratio, avg 1m
F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: Usage ratio, avg 5m
F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}] CPU{#CPU.ID}: Usage ratio, avg 5s

discovery_rule.name: CPU sensor discovery
discovery_rule.description: A table containing information of CPU sensor status on the system.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Sensor [{#CPU.SENSOR.SLOT}:{#CPU.SENSOR.INDEX}]: FAN speed
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB CPU: {#CPU.SENSOR.NAME} The fan speed (in RPM) of the indexed CPU on the system., This is only supported for the platform where the sensor data is available.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Sensor [{#CPU.SENSOR.SLOT}:{#CPU.SENSOR.INDEX}]: Name
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB Identifier for the CPU.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Sensor [{#CPU.SENSOR.SLOT}:{#CPU.SENSOR.INDEX}]: Temperature
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB CPU: {#CPU.SENSOR.NAME} The temperature of the indexed CPU on the system. This is only supported for the platform where the sensor data is available.

discovery_rule.name: File system discovery
discovery_rule.description: A table containing entries of system disk usage information.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Mount point [{#PART.NAME}]: Block size
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The number of bytes in the specified partition.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Mount point [{#PART.NAME}]: Free blocks
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The number of free blocks in the specified partition.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Mount point [{#PART.NAME}]: Free nodes
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The number of free file nodes in the specified partition.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Mount point [{#PART.NAME}]: Total blocks
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The number of total blocks in the specified partition.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Mount point [{#PART.NAME}]: Total nodes
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The number of total file nodes in the specified partition.

trigger_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Low free space in file system [{#PART.NAME}] (less than {$BIGIP.FS.FREE.WARN.MIN}% for 5m)
trigger_prototype.description: The system is running out of free space.

discovery_rule.name: Memory discovery
discovery_rule.description: Containing system statistics information of the memory usage

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}]: Total other non-TMM memory
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The total other non-TMM memory in bytes for the specified host.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}]: Total swap
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The total swap in bytes for the specified host.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}]: Total memory
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The total host memory in bytes for the specified host.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}]: Used other non-TMM memory
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The other non-TMM memory in bytes currently in use for the specified host.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}]: Used swap
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The swap in bytes currently in use for the specified host.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Host [{#HOST.ID}]: Used memory
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The host memory in bytes currently in use for the specified host.

trigger_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: High memory utilization in host [{#HOST.ID}] (over {$BIGIP.MEMORY.UTIL.WARN.MAX}% for 5m)
trigger_prototype.description: The system is running out of free memory.

trigger_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: High swap utilization in host [{#HOST.ID}] (over {$BIGIP.SWAP.UTIL.WARN.MAX}% for 5m)
trigger_prototype.description: The system is running out of free swap memory.

discovery_rule.name: Module discovery
discovery_rule.description: Resource allocation information about modules on the system

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Module [{#MODULE.NAME}]: CPU ratio
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The ratio of CPU to allocate to this module. Only valid if level is 'custom'

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Module [{#MODULE.NAME}]: Disk ratio
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The ratio of available disk space to allocate to this module. Only valid if level is 'custom'

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Module [{#MODULE.NAME}]: Memory ratio
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The ratio of available memory to allocate. Only valid if level is 'custom'

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Module [{#MODULE.NAME}]: Provision level
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The provisioning level indicates how the systems resources are distributed amongst the modules Possible values: 1 - none, 2 - minimum, 3 - nominal, 4 - dedicated, 5 - custom.

graph_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Module [{#MODULE.NAME}] resource usage ratio

discovery_rule.name: Network interface discovery
discovery_rule.description: A table containing statistic information of the interfaces on the device.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Interface [{#IF.NAME}]: Collisions
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The number of collisions on the specified interface, incremented by the number of collisions experienced during transmissions of a frame

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Interface [{#IF.NAME}]: Incoming traffic, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The rate of bytes received on this interface.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Interface [{#IF.NAME}]: Incoming packet drops
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The number of packets dropped on ingress for various reasons on the specified interface.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Interface [{#IF.NAME}]: Incoming packet error
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The number of received packets that are either undersized, oversized, or have FCS errors by the specified interface.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Interface [{#IF.NAME}]: Incoming multicast packet, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The rate of multicast packets received on this interface.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Interface [{#IF.NAME}]: Incoming packet, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The rate of packets received on this interface.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Interface [{#IF.NAME}]: Incoming QnQ packet, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The rate of double tagged packets received on the specified interface.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Interface [{#IF.NAME}]: Outgoing traffic, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The rate of bytes transmitted out of the specified interface.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Interface [{#IF.NAME}]: Outgoing packet drops
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The number of packets aged out or with excessive transmission delays due to multiple deferrals on the specified interface.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Interface [{#IF.NAME}]: Outgoing packet error
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The number of excessive collisions, incremented for each frame that experienced 16 collisions during transmission and was aborted on the specified interface.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Interface [{#IF.NAME}]: Outgoing multicast packet, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The rate of multicast packets transmitted out of the specified interface.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Interface [{#IF.NAME}]: Outgoing packet, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The rate of packets transmitted out of the specified interface.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Interface [{#IF.NAME}]: Outgoing QnQ packet, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The rate of double tagged packets transmitted out of the specified interface.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Interface [{#IF.NAME}]: Pause state

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template F5 Big-IP SNMP:bigip.net.in.error[{#IF.NAME}].last()}>{Template F5 Big-IP SNMP:bigip.net.in.error[{#IF.NAME}].prev()} or {Template F5 Big-IP SNMP:bigip.net.out.error[{#IF.NAME}].last()}>{Template F5 Big-IP SNMP:bigip.net.out.error[{#IF.NAME}].prev()}
trigger_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: There are errors on the network interface ({#IF.NAME})

discovery_rule.name: Node discovery
discovery_rule.description: A table containing statistic information of node addresses.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Node [{#NODE.NAME}]: Current connections
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The current connections from server-side to the specified node address.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Node [{#NODE.NAME}]: Incoming traffic, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The rate of bytes received by the specified node address from server-side.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Node [{#NODE.NAME}]: Incoming packet, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The rate of packets received by the specified node address from server-side.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Node [{#NODE.NAME}]: Outgoing traffic, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The rate of bytes sent to server-side from the specified node address.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Node [{#NODE.NAME}]: Outgoing packet, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The rate of packets sent to server-side from the specified node address.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Node [{#NODE.NAME}]: Current sessions
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The number of current sessions going through the specified node address.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Node [{#NODE.NAME}]: Connections hit a rate limit
F5 BIG-IP: Node [{#NODE.NAME}]: Duration of exceeding rate limit
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB Duration of time in seconds the specified node address has exceeded the configured connection rate limit.

discovery_rule.name: Pool discovery
discovery_rule.description: A table containing statistic information of pools.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Pool [{#POOL.NAME}]: Status available
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB none(0), green(1), tyellow(2), tred(3), tblue(4), tgrey(5)

trigger_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Pool {#POOL.NAME} is not available in some capacity: {ITEM.VALUE1}

dependency.name: F5 BIG-IP: Pool {#POOL.NAME} is not enabled in some capacity: {ITEM.VALUE1}

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Pool [{#POOL.NAME}]: Status enabled
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The activity status of the specified pool, as specified by the user. none(0), enabled(1), disabled(2), disabledbyparent(3)

trigger_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Pool {#POOL.NAME} is not enabled in some capacity: {ITEM.VALUE1}

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Pool [{#POOL.NAME}]: Current connections
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The current connections from server-side to the specified pool.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Pool [{#POOL.NAME}]: Incoming traffic, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The rate of bytes received by the specified pool from server-side.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Pool [{#POOL.NAME}]: Incoming packet, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The rate of packets received by the specified pool from server-side.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Pool [{#POOL.NAME}]: Outgoing traffic, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The rate of bytes sent to server-side from the specified pool.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Pool [{#POOL.NAME}]: Outgoing packet, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The rate of packets sent to server-side from the specified pool.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Pool [{#POOL.NAME}]: Current sessions
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The number of current sessions going through the specified pool.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Pool [{#POOL.NAME}]: Age of the oldest queue entry
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB Age of the oldest queue entry, max.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Pool [{#POOL.NAME}]: Queue
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB Number of connections currently in queue, sum.

discovery_rule.name: Virtual server discovery
discovery_rule.description: A table containing information of virtual servers.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Virtual server [{#VSERVER.NAME}]: Current connections
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The current connections from client-side to the specified virtual server.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Virtual server [{#VSERVER.NAME}]: Incoming traffic, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The rate of bytes received by the specified virtual server from client-side.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Virtual server [{#VSERVER.NAME}]: Incoming packet, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The rate of packets received by the specified virtual server from client-side.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Virtual server [{#VSERVER.NAME}]: Outgoing traffic, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The rate of bytes sent to client-side from the specified virtual server.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Virtual server [{#VSERVER.NAME}]: Outgoing packet, rate
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The rate of packets sent to client-side from the specified virtual server.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Virtual server [{#VSERVER.NAME}]: Connections hit a rate limit
F5 BIG-IP: Virtual server [{#VSERVER.NAME}]: Duration of exceeding rate limit
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB Duration of time in seconds the specified virtual server has exceeded the configured connection rate limit.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Virtual server [{#VSERVER.NAME}]: Usage ratio, avg 1m
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The percentage of time Virtual Server was busy over the last 1 minute.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Virtual server [{#VSERVER.NAME}]: Usage ratio, avg 5m
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The percentage of time Virtual Server was busy over the last 5 minutes.

item_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Virtual server [{#VSERVER.NAME}]: Usage ratio, avg 5s
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB The percentage of time Virtual Server was busy over the last 5 seconds.

graph_prototype.name: F5 BIG-IP: Virtual server [{#VSERVER.NAME}] usage ratio

macro.description: Minimum number of days before certificate expiration.
The warning threshold of the CPU utilization in %.
The recovery threshold of the CPU utilization in %.
The recovery threshold of the file system utilization in %.
The warning threshold of the file system utilization in %.
Filter of discoverable mount point names.
Filter to exclude discovered by mount point names.
The warning threshold of the memory utilization in %.
The recovery threshold of the memory utilization in %.
The warning threshold of the swap utilization in %.
The recovery threshold of the swap utilization in %.
The critical threshold of the temperature in °C
The warning threshold of the temperature in °C
The time interval for SNMP agent availability trigger expression.
